Package schach.model

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • schach.model.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class representing a chess piece

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Board board
      Board that the piece are on
      protected boolean isWhite
      Boolean to indicate the color of the Piece
      protected java.util.List<Square> legalNextSquares
      List of Squares that the Square could be moved to by a legal move
      protected Square position
      The Square the Piece is currently occupying

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece​(Square position,
             boolean isWhite,
             Board board)
        Constructor of Piece the square the piece is position on is marked and gets the Piece Object passed
        Parameters:
        position - denotation of the square the piece will be initiated on
        isWhite - true if it is a piece of the white set, false if black
        board - the board the piece will be played on
